title: need help figuring out this typeface.
content:
i’ve been trying to find out these typefaces and had no luck. anybody have any leads?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Photo-0473_4776.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Photo-0475_3555.jpg)

ps sorry for the low res. had to shoot photos with my cell phone.

 [‹ (x) Frank Zappa/Grandmaster Flash record covers - custom designed/Quicksilver {Dav/Tim D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20222 "Go to previous forum topic") [Antique/Art Deco Style Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46297 "Go to next forum topic")
author: schun19

comments.content: looks a lot like [Eldorado Text Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Eldorado/styles). I’m just wondering about that swashy italic ‘T’.

It’s [NixRift](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/newfonts/nixrift/familytree.html), a font by [Charles Nix](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Charles%252BNix) & [Stefano Arcella](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Stefano%252BArcella), influenced by [W.A. Dwiggins](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/W.A.%252BDwiggins)’ El Dorado.  
F
At least I was close. Good one, Florian.

Well, I saw that your guess wasn’t off the mark at all, so I [searched MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165250/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=dorado) for ‘Dorado’, to see if there were alternative versions. And, bingo! ;)
